typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		street as string,
		city as string,
		zip as string,
		state as string,
		beds as string,
		baths as string,
		sq__ft as string,
		type as string,
		sale_date as string,
		price as string,
		latitude as string,
		longitude as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> source1
